SEARCH
Package service

Class MidiPlayer

java.lang.Object
service.MidiPlayer
public class MidiPlayer extends Object
The MidiPlayer class handles the loading and playing of MIDI files for the game tracks. It synchronizes the playback of MIDI events with the visual elements on the game panel.

  • Constructor Details

    • MidiPlayer

      public MidiPlayer(MusicTrack musicTrack1, MusicTrack musicTrack2, String levelName, int delayMs)
      Constructs a MidiPlayer object with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      musicTrack1 - The first music track to synchronize with MIDI events.
      musicTrack2 - The second music track to synchronize with MIDI events.
      levelName - The name of the level associated with the MIDI file.
      delayMs - The delay in milliseconds before starting the MIDI playback.
